CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu): This is the name of the new polymer that was synthesized.
2. 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione: This is the first reactant involved in the synthesis of the new polymer.
3. 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole: This is the second reactant involved in the synthesis of the new polymer.
4. Stille reaction: This is a type of chemical reaction used to synthesize the new polymer. It is not a material, but a reaction.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione |
| 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

1. 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione
2. 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole
3. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)
4. 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl) (group attached to pyrrole)
5. 2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione (remainder of the first molecule)
6. 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin) (group attached to dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole)
7. N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole (remainder of the second molecule)
8. Stille reaction (not a property, but a reaction method)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl) (bromine content in the first molecule)
2. 2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione (remainder of the first molecule, could be considered a material if it has specific properties)
3. 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin) (trimethyl-tin content in the second molecule)
4. N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole (remainder of the second molecule, could be considered a material if it has specific properties)
5. PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) (the synthesized material)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl) |
| 2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione |
| 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin) |
| N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
